description: This file defines a Flutter widget called RootTabScaffold that provides bottom tab navigation for the main sections of an event planning and reminder app. It sets up a tab controller with four tabs, each displaying a different screen: Events, Birthdays, Messages, and Profile. The widget includes customized styling for the background and bottom navigation bar.

classes.name: RootTabScaffold
classes.description: A stateless widget that builds a scaffold with bottom tab navigation for the main app sections.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the RootTabScaffold, including a DefaultTabController, Scaffold, and TabBarView with four screens.
